thread.title: Hillary Clinton spotted out at dinner with Kate McKinnon, who impersonates her on SNL
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton spotted out at dinner with Kate McKinnon, who impersonates her on SNL

author: Helena Horton
title: Hillary Clinton spotted out at dinner with Kate McKinnon, who impersonates her on SNL
text:
Hillary Clinton spotted out at dinner with Kate McKinnon, who impersonates her on SNL The two have previously appeared on SNL together Credit: Dana Edelson/NBC/NBCU Photo Bank via Getty Images Helena Horton  21pm 
H illary Clinton, who has been spotted out and about enjoying New York City's social scene recently, was seen at dinner with Kate McKinnon. 
The former presidential hopeful and the comedian who impersonates her on Saturday Night Live were dining at Orso restaurant in NYC. 
As they ate 'rustic but Italian-inspired food' together they apparently had a lot to talk - and laugh - about. 
“Lots of laughter emanated from their table,” a diner told Page Six. 
Many on social media were excited to see the two together. Hillary Clinton had dinner with Kate McKinnon tonight and then went to see a show. Didn't think she could get any more inspirational. — Layla Navidi (@laylanavidi) February 16, 2017 me: dead insidetwitter: hillary clinton is having dinner with kate mckinnonme: the sun is shining, oxygen is wonderful, birds are chirping 
A fter spending some quiet time with her family, Hillary Clinton has been spending time on the social circuit in New York City. 
She has been welcomed with open arms by Broadway , getting a standing ovation at both recent shows she has attended. 
First, she went to see In Transit with her husband, and then saw Sunset Boulevard. 
The audience applauded and cheered when they realised who was sitting among them, and she even had a standing ovation. Hillary Clinton gets a roaring standing ovation as she takes her seat at tonight's performance of #SunsetBoulevard . — Tim Teeman (@TimTeeman) February 16, 2017 
O ne audience member wrote: "There she is in all her glory tonight. Made for a great experience". 
Another gushed: "My political icon and I was only 20 feet away. Face crack, jaw dropped, shed a tear when she walked in. Thank you Hillary for being you!" 
It seems unlikely Donald Trump will be spotted dining with his SNL counterpart Alec Baldwin, or that Sean Spicer will share spaghetti with Melissa McCarthy, but one can but hope. Watch | Alec Baldwin returns as Donald Trump in SNL 00:32
